name: Far Water
description:
Play as Charlotte, a detective investigating the disappearance of her partner, at the desolate and creepy town of Far Water. Discover cryptic clues, terrifying mysteries, and battle the realms of the unknown. 

This is a prototype game and will be updated accordingly when time permits it.

After you have left the car you can press "Escape" to bring up the map to leave each room. 

I am aware of bugs and will release a fixed version when I can.

A game by Paripa Wutikrikanlaya and Alex Humphries
